headline: How Franklin Resources (BEN) Leverages Cash Reserves to Reward Shareholders
summary: Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) is included among the 10 Cash-Rich Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now. Franklin Resources, Inc. (NYSE:BEN) directs investment portfolios of equities, fixed income, alternatives, multi-asset solutions, and cash management. Its business model is defined by fees from management in terms of total AUM, which stood at $1.61 trillion in Q3 FY25. […]
